sense.gloss: to perform a small motion repetitively (e.g. picking or poking something)
poking one's food around using one's chopsticks, playing with one's food with one's chopsticks (a breach of etiquette)

words.gloss: to perform a small motion repetitively (e.g. picking or poking something)
poking one's food around using one's chopsticks, playing with one's food with one's chopsticks (a breach of etiquette)
